resources.string: Welcome to Fascinating Feng Shui!\nAnswer the following questions to test your knowledge of all things feng shui, then hit \"submit\" to find out your score!
Feng shui is the study of the interaction between which two of the following?
Qi or chi is another word for
in China more than 3,000 years ago
Which of the following is an important concept in feng shui?
the importance of a red door
placing a cat statue in your window
Would a traditional feng shui practitioner recommend buying a house at the end of a T intersection?
Sha qi is the name of the negative energy that comes off of sharp corners and pointed objects.
Where would a traditional feng shui practitioner recommend building a house?
Near the front of the lot, so you have a big back yard
Near the back of the lot, so you have an impressive front yard
In the center of the lot
